txt.en: The champion Déornyd has become separated from his party and needs your help.
The guardian Nef has become separated from his party and needs your help.
The Lost Fellowship was a brave party that set off from Angmar to find a great treasure in Forochel. Unfortunately, they encountered some trouble along the way....
The burglar Warstang has become separated from his party and needs your help.
The captain Reginald Ward has become separated from his party and needs your help.
The hunter Thurmaer has become separated from his party and needs your help.
The lore-master Cenlieg has become separated from his party and needs your help.
The minstrel Burgthryth has become separated from her party and needs your help.
Now that you have helped all the members of the Lost Fellowship, you should speak to the party's Captain, Reginald Ward in Sûri-kylä.

'Hello again! So you have helped all of my fellows? Including Burgthryth, the Minstrel? You have more patience than I. I could hardly stand the man! Oh well, the treasure we seek will make it all worthwhile, in the end... at least that is what I hope.\n\n'Now friend, don't let me trouble you further. You have done us all a great service, and perhaps if we do discover the treasure, I shall share a small portion of it with you. For now, all I can offer is my gratitude and a small token of my esteem.'
